New Records: Bailey Falter pitched six no-hit innings against the Miami Marlins, a notable performance in the game
Key Match Events: Bailey Falter struck out the side on 10 pitches in the first inning
Kyle Stowers reached to start the third inning before being erased when Javier Sanoja grounded into a double play
Jonah Bride walked to lead off the fifth
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pittsburgh Pirates were no-hit by the Cubs in a 12-0 loss on Sept. 4, managing three walks against Shota Imanaga, Nate Pearson and Porter Hodge
Others: Bailey Falter is 17-21 with a 4.65 ERA in 84 games (55 starts) for the Pirates and the Philadelphia Phillies
